body:
I have already made a post saying a few words. But as a last minute thing, just wanna say thanks to everyone for making Avicus what it was, I seen lots of changes over the years. Alot of staff have put alot of work into the server, and thanks for that one aswell. It helped during times of board em and that, so cheers

I will uploading a few videos of the server actually closing a few other things to do with it closing here, so feel free to pop on my channel in a few days to see it all uploaded etc.
-https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCExs5BA07Q2vDgy7dvMVvbA?view_as=subscriber  

Thanks everyone and have a good life

-XtraMajestical / 7788james / XtraTestical

title: Cya later
